chara.textHome:
If anyone picks on Kyoko,
I'll beat them up real bad!
So you better treat her nice!
Cause I'm a Magical Girl, ya know?!

If you're mean to her I'll make you
REALLY sorry!

I wanna be Kyoko's hero...
just like how she was mine.
I want her to be glad she's got me around!
I can get stronger and stronger forever!

I tried really hard!
Wanna celebrate with me?

Now you don't need to be scared of
anything! Not the dark or ghosts,
not even Witches!

Cause you've got the
new super strong Yuma here!
I'm gonna work real hard to get stronger.
And I'm not just talking about magic!

If people are hurt or about to give up,
I wanna heal their hearts for 'em.

I want everyone to think of me
as their helping hand!
I hate being left alone at home...
Hey, can you come earlier tomorrow?
I'll be a good girl while I wait...
Hey! I want pancakes for breakfast!
But not if you're a picky eater.
Kyoko said it's bad to be picky.
Hey, do you know where Kyubey went?
I wanna go to a theme park!
Have you ever been on a rollercoaster?
You get ready too! Let's go together!
I'll save anyone who gets into trouble!
I wonder if I can be like Kyoko one day...
I'm gonna grow up and get big like Kyoko!
I'm scary when I'm angry, ya know!
Kyoko is my hero. She saved me.
So next time it's my turn to save her!
I don't like her, she's kinda scary...
It's because she always says scary things!
I won't do anything you tell me not to.

I don't want you to feel like 
you don't need me around...
I can always be with Kyoko,
She won't leave me, will she?
Tell me how good a girl I am!
Don't look down on me just 'cause I'm small!

Make sure to call me Yuma, okay?
Or I'll get mad!
Look, looooook! I got really strong!

Hee hee!
I'm a full-grown Magical Girl too!
Wowie! I hope Kyoko tells me I did great...

I can protect Kyoko from
any kind of bad guy!

I can handle anything so long
as Kyoko's with me!
I became a Magical Girl for her, ya know?
